1.3.name: wordpress/wp-statusnet
1.3.description:
Every time you make a new blog post this plugin will post a status update to the Status.net servers and Twitter accounts you have specified. You can set as many acounts on as many servers you like. You can even have the plugin to post to different account on the same Status.net server.

The links to your blog can be shortened by one of seven different link shortener services like TinyURL.com.
